    • Method Detail

      • manageRound

        public void manageRound()
        Manage the round flow, based on the current phase. A round is split in 8 phase: - in 1,3,5 players can use their power up - in 2,4 they can perform actions - the 6th is used to reload weapons - the 7th allowed all the players to use their end-round powerUP - the 8th manage the dead players

      • nextPhase

        public void nextPhase()
        Pass to ne next round phase

      • performEndRoundPowerUpEffect

        public void performEndRoundPowerUpEffect(java.lang.String powerUpOwner,
                                         java.lang.String[] powerUpType,
                                         CubeColour[] powerUpColour)
        Perform the end-round powerUps effects
        Parameters:
        powerUpOwner - is the username of the player who want to use the powerUps
        powerUpType - is a list of all the types of powerUps that the player want to use
        powerUpColour - is a list of colours associated with the types of powerUpType

      • getActionManager

        public ActionManager getActionManager()
